original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston @167a *//
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston @167a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the fruit of non-returning is void.

original: to; ;dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: to; ;dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the state of a worthy one is void.

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is void.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the knowledge of path aspects is void.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the knowledge of all aspects is void.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
translated: Subhūti, thus does the perfection of wisdom give birth to the tathāgatas

original: 'jig rten ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ston pa'o //
translated: and show the world.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom🔽shows the tathāgatas the world as empty of transcending the world.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na /
translated: How does it show the world as empty of transcending the world?

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is “empty of being empty.”🔽He teaches that the world of feeling is “empty of being empty.”

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of perception is “empty of being empty.”

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is “empty of being empty.”

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is “empty of being empty.”🔽He teaches that the world of the eyes is “empty of being empty.”

original: rna ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ears is “empty of being empty.”🔽He teaches that the world of the nose is “empty of being empty.”

original: lce'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @167b zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @167b zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue is “empty of being empty.”

original: lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the mind is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: sgra'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sgra'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of sound is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: dri'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;ro'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dri'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;ro'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of smell is beyond extremes and is empty. He teaches that the world of taste is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: reg gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of touch is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mental phenomena is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eye consciousness is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ear consciousness is beyond the extreme of emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the nose consciousness is beyond the extreme of emptiness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue consciousness is beyond the extreme of emptiness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body consciousness is beyond the extreme of emptiness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar @168a *//
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar @168a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the mind consciousness is beyond the extreme of emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of eye contact is beyond the extreme of emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of ear contact is beyond the extreme of emptiness.

original: ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of nose contact is beyond the extreme of emptiness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the union of the tongue is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the union of the body is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the union of the mind is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye is the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the ear is the emptiness of what transcends limits.🔽He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the nose is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the tongue is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the body as a condition is infinite and empty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the mind as a condition is infinite and empty.

original: sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the earth element is infinite and empty.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the water element is infinite and empty.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @168b zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa @168b zhes bya bar ston to // rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the fire element is infinite and empty.🔽He teaches that the world of the wind element is infinite and empty.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the space element is infinite and empty.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the consciousness element is infinite and empty.

original: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of ignorance is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of volitional factors is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of consciousness is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of name-and-form is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the six sense fields is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of contact is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sred pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sred pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of feeling is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The world of craving is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: len pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: len pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of grasping is taught to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: srid pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of existence is beyond extremes.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of old age and death is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of generosity is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @169a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @169a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of discipline

original: 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of patience is beyond extremes and is empty. He teaches that the world of the perfection of effort is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of concentration is beyond extremes and is empty.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the perfection of wisdom is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that inner emptiness is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that outer emptiness is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that inner and outer emptiness is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the emptiness of emptiness is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that great emptiness is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the emptiness of the ultimate is the world beyond extremes, which is emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of the conditioned is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of the unconditioned is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽thog ma dang tha @169b ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // thog ma dang tha @169b ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of what transcends limits is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”🔽The world of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of non-rejection is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of a basic nature is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of all things is revealed as “the emptiness of what transcends limits.”

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of defining characteristics is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The world of the emptiness of non-observation is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of non-entities is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.🔽The world of the emptiness of essential nature is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the applications of mindfulness is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the right efforts is shown to be the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the bases of supernatural power.🔽He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the faculties.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las @170a *//
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las @170a *//
translated: He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the powers.

original: 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the noble eightfold path.🔽He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world as transcendent emptiness with regard to the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the formless meditative stabilizations are the world that is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the eight deliverances are the world that is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the nine serial absorptions are the world that is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation are the world that is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the clairvoyances are the world that is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the meditative stabilizations are the world that is the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals that the dhāraṇī gateways are the emptiness that transcends the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are the emptiness that transcends the world.

original: mi 'jigs pa @170b bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa @170b bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals that the four fearlessnesses are the emptiness that transcends the world.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are the emptiness that transcends the world.🔽He reveals that great love is the emptiness that transcends the world.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals that great compassion is the emptiness that transcends the world.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals that the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the emptiness that transcends the world.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the result of stream enterer as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits;🔽the result of once-returner as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the result of non-returner as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits;

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the state of a worthy one as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits;

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: a pratyekabuddha’s awakening as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects as the world’s emptiness that transcends limits.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te //
translated: The Tathāgata teaches that the world is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na /🔽gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo @171a *//
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na / gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo @171a *//
translated: How does he teach that the world is empty of an intrinsic nature?

original: nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is empty of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of feeling is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of conception is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: mig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eye is empty of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the ear is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the nose is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue is empty of inherent existence.

original: lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body is empty of inherent existence.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the mind is empty of inherent existence.

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is empty of inherent existence.

original: sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sgra'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dri'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of sound is empty of inherent existence.🔽He teaches that the world of smell is empty of inherent existence.

original: ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ro'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // reg gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of taste is empty of inherent existence.🔽He teaches that the world of touch is empty of inherent existence.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mental objects is empty of inherent existence.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye consciousness is empty of inherent existence.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ear consciousness is empty of an essence.🔽He teaches that the world of the nose consciousness is empty of an essence.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa @171b zhes bya bar ston to //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa @171b zhes bya bar ston to // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue consciousness is empty of an essence.🔽He teaches that the world of the body consciousness is empty of an essence.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the thinking consciousness is empty of an essence.🔽He teaches that the world of eye contact is empty of an essence.🔽He teaches that the world of ear contact is empty of an essence.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of nose contact is empty of an essence.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the union of the tongue is empty of essence.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the union of the body is empty of essence.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the union of the mind is empty of essence.🔽He teaches that the world of the experience of the conditions of the union of the eye is empty of essence.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the experience of the conditions of the union of the ear is empty of essence.🔽He teaches that the world of the experience of the conditions of the union of the nose is empty of essence.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the experience of the conditions of the union of the tongue is empty of essence.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the body as a condition is empty of essence.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the mind as a condition is empty of essence.🔽He teaches that the world of the earth element is empty of essence.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong @172a *//🔽pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong @172a *// pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the water element is empty of essence.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the fire element is empty of essence.

original: rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the wind element is empty of essence. He teaches that the world of the space element is empty of essence.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the consciousness element is empty of essence.

original: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of ignorance is shown to be empty of essence.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of volitional factors is shown to be empty of essence.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of consciousness is shown to be empty of essence.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // skye mched drug gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of name and form is shown to be empty of essence.🔽The world of the six sense spheres is shown to be empty of essence.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of contact is shown to be empty of essence.🔽The world of feeling is shown to be empty of essence.

original: sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽len pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sred pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // len pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of craving is shown to be empty of essence.🔽The world of appropriation is shown to be empty of essence.

original: srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of existence is shown to be empty of essence.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: rga shi'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of aging and death is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of generosity is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽bzod pa'i @172b pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // bzod pa'i @172b pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of moral discipline is empty of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the perfection of patience is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of perseverance is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of concentration is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of wisdom is empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of inner emptiness is taught to be empty of an essence.🔽The world of outer emptiness is taught to be empty of an essence.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of outer and inner emptiness is taught to be empty of an essence.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of emptiness is taught to be empty of an essence.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of great emptiness is taught to be empty of an essence.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of ultimate reality is taught to be empty of an essence.🔽The world of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is taught to be empty of an essence.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is taught to be empty of an essence.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of the unlimited is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.🔽The world of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of non-repudiation is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽chos thams cad stong @173a *//🔽pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // chos thams cad stong @173a *// pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of nature is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.🔽The world of the emptiness of all things is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.🔽The world of the emptiness of specific characteristics is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of non-apprehension is revealed as the emptiness of own-nature.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of non-apprehension is shown to be empty of essential nature.🔽The world of the emptiness of essential nature is shown to be empty of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension is shown to be empty of essential nature.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the applications of mindfulness is shown to be empty of essential nature.🔽The world of the right efforts is shown to be empty of essential nature.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the bases of supernatural power is shown to be empty of essential nature.🔽The world of the faculties is shown to be empty of essential nature.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of the powers is shown to be empty of essential nature.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the branches of enlightenment is empty of any essence of its own.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the noble eightfold path is empty of any essence of its own.🔽He teaches that the world of the noble truths is empty of any essence of its own.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the concentrations is empty of any essence of its own.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar @173b ston to //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar @173b ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the immeasurables is empty of any essence of its own.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the formless absorptions is empty of any essence of its own.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eight deliverances is empty of any essence of its own. He teaches that the world of the nine serial absorptions is empty of any essence of its own.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation is empty of any essence of its own.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the superknowledges is empty of any essence of its own.🔽He teaches that the world of the meditative stabilizations is empty of any essence of its own.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the dhāraṇī gateways is empty of any essence of its own.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ten powers of the tathāgatas is empty of any essence of its own.🔽He teaches that the world of the fearlessnesses is empty of any essence of its own.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the detailed and thorough knowledges is empty of any essence of its own.

original: byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of great love is revealed as empty of essence;

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of great compassion is revealed as empty of essence;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha is revealed as empty of essence;

original: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar @174a *//
analyzed: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar @174a *//
translated: the world of the fruit of entering the stream is revealed as empty of essence;🔽the world of the fruit of being tied to one more birth is revealed as empty of essence;

original: ston to // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ston to // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is revealed as empty of essence;🔽the world of arhatship is revealed as empty of essence;

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is revealed as empty of essence;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects teaches the world of the knowledge of paths as empty of an inherent nature.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects teaches the world of the knowledge of all aspects as empty of an inherent nature.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to /
translated: teaches the Tathāgata the world as empty of an inherent nature that is not a thing.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na /🔽gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na / gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: Subhūti, how does the perfection of wisdom teach the Tathāgata the world as empty of an inherent nature that is not a thing?🔽It teaches the world of form as empty of an inherent nature that is not a thing.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It teaches the world of feeling as empty of an inherent nature that is not a thing.

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of perceptions is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: mig gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar @174b ston to //🔽sna'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar @174b ston to // sna'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eyes is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the ears is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the nose is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: lce'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the mental world is taught to be the display of the nature of non-entityness.

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the form world is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entityness.

original: sgra'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dri'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sgra'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dri'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the sound world is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entityness.🔽the smell world is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entityness.

original: ro'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ro'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the taste world is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entityness.

original: reg gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the touch world is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entityness.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the dharma world is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entityness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the eye consciousness world is taught to be the display of the nature of non-entityness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ear consciousness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the nose consciousness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue consciousness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body consciousness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten @175a *//
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten @175a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the thinking-mind consciousness

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of eye contact is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear contact is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of nose contact is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature. He teaches that the world of the coming together of tongue contact is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of body contact is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the coming together of thinking-mind contact is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the experience of an eye contact as a condition is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the experience of an ear contact as a condition is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the nose as a condition is empty of an inherent essence that is not something that can be crushed.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the tongue as a condition is empty of an inherent essence that is not something that can be crushed.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the body as a condition is empty of an inherent essence that is not something that can be crushed.

original: yid kyi @175b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi @175b 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling that has contact with the thinking mind as a condition is empty of an inherent essence that is not something that can be crushed.🔽He teaches that the world of the earth element is empty of an inherent essence that is not something that can be crushed.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the water element is empty of an inherent essence that is not something that can be crushed.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the fire element is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the wind element is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the space element is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the world of the consciousness element is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ignorance is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of name and form is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.🔽He teaches that the world of the six sense fields is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of contact is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston @176a *//
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston @176a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.🔽He teaches that the world of craving is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.

original: to; ;len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽srid pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: to; ;len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // srid pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of appropriation is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.🔽He teaches that the world of existence is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
