analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is empty of an inherent nature that is not something that can be found.

original: rga sha'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga sha'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of old age and death is empty of an essential nature that is not a thing.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of generosity is empty of an essential nature that is not a thing.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of moral discipline is empty of an essential nature that is not a thing.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of patience is empty of an essential nature that is not a thing.🔽He teaches that the world of the perfection of effort is empty of an essential nature that is not a thing.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of meditation is empty of an essential nature that is not a thing.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The perfection of wisdom teaches that the world is empty of the nature of non-entity.🔽The emptiness of internal phenomena teaches that the world is empty of the nature of non-entity.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The emptiness of external phenomena teaches that the world is empty of the nature of non-entity.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The emptiness of both internal and external phenomena teaches that the world is empty of the nature of non-entity.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten @176b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten @176b dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness teaches that the world is empty of the nature of non-entity.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The emptiness of great extent teaches that the world is empty of the nature of non-entity.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ston pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of ultimate emptiness is taught as “the emptiness of the essence of non-things.”

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of conditioned emptiness is taught as “the emptiness of the essence of non-things.”

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of unconditioned emptiness is taught as “the emptiness of the essence of non-things.”

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness beyond extremes is taught as “the emptiness of the essence of non-things.”

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness without beginning or end is taught as “the emptiness of the essence of non-things.”

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness without discarding is taught as “the emptiness of the essence of non-things.”

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness of inherent existence is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness of all phenomena is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness of specific characteristics is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness of non-apprehension is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness of non-things is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya @177a *//🔽bar ston to //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya @177a *//🔽bar ston to //
translated: The world of emptiness of essential nature is taught to be the emptiness of the nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the applications of mindfulness is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity.🔽He teaches that the world of the right efforts is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the bases of supernatural powers is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity.🔽He teaches that the world of the faculties is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the powers is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an entity.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the elements leading to enlightenment are the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the noble eightfold path is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the noble truths are the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the meditative stabilizations are the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.🔽He teaches that the immeasurables are the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the formless meditative attainments are the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi @177b 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi @177b 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eight liberations is empty of an essential nature that is not nonexistent.🔽He teaches that the world of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption is empty of an essential nature that is not nonexistent.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to; ;rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation is empty of an essential nature that is not nonexistent.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the superknowledges is empty of an essential nature that is not nonexistent.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the meditative stabilities is empty of an essential nature that is not nonexistent.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the dhāraṇī gateways is empty of an essential nature that is not nonexistent.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are the world, which is the emptiness of the essential nature that is not an entity.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the four fearlessnesses are the world, which is the emptiness of the essential nature that is not an entity.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are the world, which is the emptiness of the essential nature that is not an entity.🔽He teaches that great love is the world, which is the emptiness of the essential nature that is not an entity.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that great compassion is the world, which is the emptiness of the essential nature that is not an entity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the world, which is the emptiness of the essential nature that is not an entity.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽@178a *// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // @178a *// lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world system of the result of stream enterer is revealed to be empty of an inherent essence that is a non-thing;🔽the world system of the result of once-returner is revealed to be empty of an inherent essence that is a non-thing;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to // dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world system of the result of non-returner is revealed to be empty of an inherent essence that is a non-thing;🔽the world system of the state of a worthy one is revealed to be empty of an inherent essence that is a non-thing;

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world system of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is revealed to be empty of an inherent essence that is a non-thing;

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the world system of the knowledge of path aspects is revealed to be empty of an inherent essence that is a non-thing;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: and the reality of the knowledge of all modes is shown to be empty of own-being.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Moreover, Subhuti, the perfection of wisdom

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te /
translated: shows the Tathagata the world as calm.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na /
translated: And how does the perfection of wisdom show the Tathagata the world as calm?

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows him the world of form as calm.🔽It shows him the world of feeling as calm.

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows him the world of perception as calm.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows him the world of the will to action as calm.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows him the world of consciousness as calm.🔽It shows him the world of the eye as calm.

original: rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: It shows him the world of the ear as calm.

original: sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the nose is peace.

original: lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya @178b bar ston te //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya @178b bar ston te //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue is peace.

original: lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body is peace.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the mind is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of sights is peace.

original: sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sgra'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // dri'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of sounds is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of smells is peace.

original: ro'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ro'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of tastes is peace.

original: reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of touches is peace.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mental phenomena is peace.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye consciousness is peace.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear consciousness is peace.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of nose consciousness is peace. He teaches that the world of tongue consciousness is peace.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body consciousness is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of the mind consciousness is peace.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of eye contact is peace.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear contact is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of nose contact is peace.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of tongue contact is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of body contact is peace.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mind contact is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is peace.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg @179a *//
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg @179a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is peace.

original: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling conditioned by contact at the tongue is peaceful.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling conditioned by contact at the body is peaceful.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling conditioned by contact at the intellect is peaceful.🔽He teaches that the world of the earth element is peaceful.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the water element is peaceful.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the fire element is peaceful.🔽He teaches that the world of the wind element is peaceful.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the space element is peaceful.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the consciousness element is peaceful.

original: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ignorance is calm.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is calm.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is calm.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of name-and-form is calm.

original: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the six sense-spheres is calm.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of contact is calm.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of feeling is calm.🔽He teaches that the world of craving is calm.

original: len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of clinging is calm.🔽He teaches that the world of existence is calm.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is calm.

original: rga shi'i 'jig @179b rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'jig @179b rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of old age and death is calm.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of generosity is calm.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the perfection of morality, saying, “It is peace.”🔽He teaches the world the perfection of patience, saying, “It is peace.”

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the perfection of perseverance, saying, “It is peace.”

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the perfection of concentration, saying, “It is peace.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the perfection of wisdom, saying, “It is peace.”🔽He teaches the world the emptiness of internal phenomena, saying, “It is peace.”

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the emptiness of external phenomena, saying, “It is peace.”

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, saying, “It is peace.”

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world the emptiness of emptiness, saying, “It is peace.”

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the great is peace. He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the ultimate is peace.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the conditioned is peace.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of the unconditioned is peace. He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is peace.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is peace.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of nonrepudiation is peace.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of nature is peace.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rang gi mtshan @180a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rang gi mtshan @180a *//
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of all phenomena is peace.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is peace.

original: nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of emptiness of essential nature to be peace.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of emptiness of non-apprehension to be peace.🔽He teaches the world of emptiness of non-entities to be peace.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of emptiness of essential existence to be peace.🔽He teaches the world of emptiness of the essential existence of non-entities to be peace.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the applications of mindfulness to be peace.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the right efforts to be peace.🔽He teaches the world of the bases of supernatural power to be peace.🔽He teaches the world of the faculties to be peace.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the powers to be peace.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the limbs of awakening are peace.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the noble eightfold path is peace.🔽He teaches that the noble truths are peace.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to; ;bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the concentrations are peace.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the immeasurables are peace.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the formless absorptions are peace.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the eight deliverances are peace.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya @180b bar ston to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya @180b bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the nine serial steps of meditative absorption are peace.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation are peace.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the superknowledges are peace.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the meditative stabilizations are peace.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the dhāraṇī gateways are peace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the ten powers of the Tathāgata are peace.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the four fearlessnesses are peace.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to // byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are peace.🔽He shows that great love is peace.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that great compassion is peace.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are peace.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He shows that the result of stream enterer is peace.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the result of being tied to one more rebirth is a world that is peaceful.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the result of not returning is a world that is peaceful.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the state of a worthy one is a world that is peaceful.

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is a world that is peaceful.

original: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the knowledge of path aspects is a world that is peaceful.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the knowledge of all aspects is a world that is peaceful.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing /
translated: Subhūti, in this way the perfection of wisdom gives birth to the tathāgatas

original: @181a *// 'jig rten ston pa'o //
analyzed: @181a *// 'jig rten ston pa'o //
translated: and shows the world.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom shows the tathāgatas that the world is empty.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na /
translated: How does it show that the world is empty?

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of feeling is emptiness.

original: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of perception is emptiness.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of volitional factors is emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // mig gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of consciousness is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the eye is emptiness.

original: rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the ear is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the nose is emptiness.

original: lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the tongue is emptiness.

original: lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the body is emptiness.

original: yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the thinking-mind is emptiness.

original: gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of form is emptiness.

original: sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of sound is emptiness.

original: dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of smell is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of taste is emptiness.

original: reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of touch is emptiness.

original: chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mental phenomena is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of eye consciousness is emptiness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid @181b ces bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid @181b ces bya bar ston to // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear consciousness is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of nose consciousness is emptiness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of tongue consciousness is emptiness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of body consciousness is emptiness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the mental consciousness is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of eye contact is emptiness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of ear contact is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of nose contact is emptiness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of tongue contact is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of body contact is emptiness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of mind contact is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is emptiness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is emptiness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the feeling that has the nose as its source, the smell as its objective, and the contact as its immediate condition, as being emptiness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the feeling that has the tongue as its source, the taste as its objective, and the contact as its immediate condition, as being emptiness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the feeling that has the body as its source, the tangible as its objective, and the contact as its immediate condition, as being emptiness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston @182a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston @182a *//
translated: He teaches the world of the feeling that has the mind as its source, the mental objects as its objective, and the contact as its immediate condition, as being emptiness.

original: to // sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: to // sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the earth element as being emptiness.

original: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the water element as being emptiness.

original: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: me'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the fire element as being emptiness.🔽He teaches the world of the wind element as being emptiness.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches the world of the space element as being emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the element of consciousness is taught to be emptiness.

original: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of ignorance is taught to be emptiness.

original: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of volitional factors is taught to be emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of consciousness is taught to be emptiness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of name-and-form is taught to be emptiness.

original: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the six sense spheres is taught to be emptiness.

original: reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of contact is taught to be emptiness.

original: tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of feeling is taught to be emptiness.🔽the world of craving is taught to be emptiness.

original: len ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: len ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of clinging is taught to be emptiness.

original: srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of existence is taught to be emptiness.

original: skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of birth is emptiness.

original: rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of old age and death is emptiness.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of generosity is emptiness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid @182b ces bya bar ston to //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid @182b ces bya bar ston to // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of conduct is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the perfection of patience is emptiness.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of diligence is emptiness.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of concentration is emptiness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the perfection of wisdom is emptiness.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of inner emptiness is emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of external emptiness is emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of internal and external emptiness is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of emptiness is emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of great emptiness is emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to /
translated: He teaches that the world of ultimate emptiness is emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of conditioned emptiness is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of unconditioned emptiness is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what transcends limits is emptiness.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is emptiness.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world is the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world is the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: @183a *// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: @183a *// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world is the emptiness of its own mark.🔽He teaches that the world is the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world is the emptiness of nonthings.🔽He teaches that the world is the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world is the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the applications of mindfulness is emptiness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the right efforts is emptiness.🔽He teaches that the world of the bases of supernatural powers is emptiness.

original: dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the faculties is emptiness.

original: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the powers is emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the branches of enlightenment is emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the noble eightfold path is emptiness.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the noble truths is emptiness.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the meditative stabilities is emptiness.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the immeasurables is empty.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya @183b bar ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya @183b bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the formless absorptions is empty.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the eight aspects of liberation is empty.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption is empty.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the emptiness aspect of liberation, the aspect of signlessness, and the aspect of aspirationlessness is empty.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the forms of higher knowing is empty.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the meditative stabilities is empty.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He teaches that the world of the dhāraṇī gateways is empty.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the four assurances.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the four kinds of exact knowledge.🔽He reveals the world to be the emptiness of great loving kindness.

original: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //🔽lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the result of stream enterer.🔽He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: He reveals the world to be the emptiness of the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya @184a *//🔽bar ston to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya @184a *// bar ston to //
translated: the world of the state of arhatship is taught to be emptiness,

original: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of individual enlightenment is taught to be emptiness,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: the world of the knowledge of path aspects is taught to be emptiness,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to //
translated: and the world of the knowledge of all aspects is taught to be emptiness.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
translated: In that way, Subhūti, the perfection of wisdom gives birth to the Tathāgata

original: 'jig rten ston pa'o ////
analyzed: 'jig rten ston pa'o ////
translated: and teaches the world.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya bcu gsum pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya bcu gsum pa //
translated: Volume 123

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na /
translated: “Subhūti, how does this deep perfection of wisdom teach the world?

original: ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur la /
translated: In such a way that it does not become an idea in this world,

original: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te /
translated: He shows that it does not even become a perception of a world beyond.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because there is no such dharma by which there would be a perception of this world,

original: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do //
translated: or by which there would be a perception of a world beyond.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of the great meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
translated: Blessed One, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of the inconceivable meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of the immeasurable meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha @184b rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha @184b rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of the incomparable meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of an incomparable meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: The Lord said:🔽“So it is, Subhūti!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: So it is, Subhūti!🔽This perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a great meaning.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of an inconceivable meaning.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of an immeasurable meaning.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of an incomparable meaning.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of an unequalled meaning.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of an unsurpassed meaning.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.🔽Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is not equal to even the slightest dharma.

original: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so //
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is present for the sake of a meaning that is

original: rab 'byor / ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, in what way is the perfection of wisdom present as the great meaning?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste /
translated: Subhūti, this is the great meaning of the tathāgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas.

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i don to //
translated: It is the meaning of protecting all sentient beings and the meaning of not abandoning all sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des na /
translated: Subhūti, by this one of many explanations

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so //🔽rab @185a *// 'byor /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so // rab @185a *// 'byor /
translated: the perfection of wisdom is present as the great meaning of the tathāgatas, the worthy ones, the perfectly complete buddhas.

original: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, in what way is the perfection of wisdom present as the inconceivable meaning?

original: rab 'byor / sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
