analyzed: ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the eight aspects of liberation are not apprehended in terms of being thought of, measured, quantified, equal, or unequal?

original: ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam @215b pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam @215b pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the nine serial absorptions are not found to have any basis that can be conceived or measured, any measure, any sameness, or any difference?

original: ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation are not found to have any basis that can be conceived or measured, any measure, any sameness, or any difference?

original: ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the clairvoyances are not found to have any basis that can be conceived or measured, any measure, any sameness, or any difference?

original: ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the meditative stabilities are not found to have any basis that can be conceived or measured, any measure, any sameness, or any difference?

original: ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the dhāraṇī gateways are not found to have any basis that can be conceived or measured, any measure, any sameness, or any difference?

original: ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the tathāgatas’ powers cannot be apprehended in terms of being thought of, being measured, being quantified, being the same, or being different?

original: ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the fearlessnesses cannot be apprehended in terms of being thought of, being measured, being quantified, being the same, or being different?

original: ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /🔽ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /🔽ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang @216a *//
analyzed: ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags / ci'i slad du byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags / ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang @216a *//
translated: Why is it that the detailed and thorough knowledges cannot be apprehended in terms of being thought of, being measured, being quantified, being the same, or being different?🔽Why is it that great love cannot be apprehended in terms of being thought of, being measured, being quantified, being the same, or being different?

original: dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs ba lags /
analyzed: dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs ba lags /
translated: Why is it that great compassion cannot be apprehended in terms of being thought of, being measured, being quantified, being the same, or being different?

original: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /🔽ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags / ci'i slad du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are non-apprehensible in terms of sameness and difference?🔽Why is it that the result of stream enterer is non-apprehensible in terms of sameness and difference?

original: ci'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the result of once-returner is non-apprehensible in terms of sameness and difference?

original: ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the result of non-returner is non-apprehensible in terms of sameness and difference?

original: ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the state of a worthy one is non-apprehensible in terms of sameness and difference?

original: ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that a pratyekabuddha is not apprehended as being equivalent to, or numerically different from, or existent or nonexistent, or as the same as or different from, or as being so or not being so?

original: ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags /
translated: Why is it that the knowledge of path aspects is not apprehended as being equivalent to, or numerically different from, or existent or nonexistent, or as the same as or different from, or as being so or not being so?

original: ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa @216b lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa @216b lags /
translated: Why is it that the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended as being equivalent to, or numerically different from, or existent or nonexistent, or as the same as or different from, or as being so or not being so?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: “Su­bhūti, the essential nature of physical forms is inconceivable, immeasurable, and incalculable.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equivalent to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, physical forms are not apprehended as being equivalent to, or numerically different from, or existent or nonexistent, or as the same as or different from, or as being so or not being so.

original: rab 'byor / tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of feeling is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared to anything.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in feeling, thought, measure, comparison, and the unequaled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'du shes kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of perception is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared to anything.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in perception, thought, measure, comparison, and the unequaled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of volitional factors is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared to anything.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in volitional factors, thought, measure, comparison, and the unequaled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of consciousness is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //🔽rab 'byor / mig @217a *//
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so // rab 'byor / mig @217a *//
translated: Therefore, in consciousness, thought, imagination, measure, equality, and the unequaled are not apprehended.

original: gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of the eye is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mig la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the eye, thought, imagination, measure, equality, and the unequaled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of the ear is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the ear, thought, imagination, measure, equality, and the unequaled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the nature of the nose is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sna la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the nose, thought, imagination, and appraisal, as well as equality and inequality, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the nature of the tongue is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lce la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the tongue, thought, imagination, and appraisal, as well as equality and inequality, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the nature of the body is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lus la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the body, thought, imagination, and appraisal, as well as equality and inequality, are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu @217b med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu @217b med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of mind is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir yid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in mind, thought, and conception, an equal or unequal cannot be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of form is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in form, thought, and conception, an equal or unequal cannot be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of sound is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in sound, thought, and conception, an equal or unequal cannot be apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dri'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the real nature of smell is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dri la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the thought, the measure, the appraisal, the equality, and the inequality of smell are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / ro'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the real nature of taste is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rol bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the thought, the measure, the appraisal, the equality, and the inequality of taste are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / reg gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the real nature of touch is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /🔽de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / @218a *//
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste / de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / @218a *//
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the thought, the measure, the appraisal, the equality, and the inequality of touch are non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the real nature of mental phenomena is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: the unequal and the equal.

original: de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the thought, the evaluation, the measure, the equality, and the inequality of phenomena are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of eye consciousness is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised;

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is the unequal and the equal.

original: de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the thought, the evaluation, the measure, the equality, and the inequality of eye consciousness are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of ear consciousness is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be appraised;

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is the unequal and the equal.

original: de'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //

translated: Therefore, in the emptiness of inherent existence, thought, imagination, measure, and the equal and unequal are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared to anything.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequalled.

original: de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, you cannot apprehend any thought, calculation, measure, equality, or inequality in the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: rab 'byor / byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of great love is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequalled.

original: de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in great love, thought, measurement, comparison, and the unequalled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of great compassion is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /🔽de'i phyir snying rje @227a *//
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste / de'i phyir snying rje @227a *//
translated: It is equal to the unequalled.

original: chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in great compassion, thought, measurement, comparison, and the unequalled are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequalled.

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not apprehended as being measurable or not measurable.

original: rab 'byor / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the result of stream enterer is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared to anything;

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the result of stream enterer is not apprehended as being measurable or not measurable.

original: rab 'byor / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the result of once-returner is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared to anything;

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the result of once-returner is not apprehended as being measurable or not measurable.

original: rab 'byor / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of the result of non-returning is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam @227b pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam @227b pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the result of non-returning, thought, measure, comparison, equal, and unequal are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of arhatship is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in arhatship, thought, measure, comparison, equal, and unequal are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: Subhūti, the essence of individual enlightenment is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be compared.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: It is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in self-awakening, thought, imagination, measure, equality, and inequality are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
translated: “Subhūti, the intrinsic nature of the knowledge of path aspects is inconceivable, immeasurable, and incomparable;

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, in the knowledge of path aspects, thought, imagination, measure, equality, and inequality are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med la /

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste /
translated: it is equal to the unequaled.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so ////
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so ////
translated: Therefore, in the knowledge of all aspects, thought, imagination, measure, equality, and inequality are not apprehended.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact, which is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be quantified, and which is equal to the unequaled, something that can be apprehended?

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, which is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be quantified, and which is equal to the unequaled, something that can be apprehended?🔽Is the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, which is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be quantified, and which is equal to the unequaled, something that can be apprehended?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, which is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be quantified, and which is equal to the unequaled, something that can be apprehended?🔽Is the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, which is inconceivable, immeasurable, and cannot be quantified, and which is equal to the unequaled, something that can be apprehended?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la @230a *//🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la @230a *// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from the condition of the tongue’s contact with its objects, which is beyond being an object of comparison, to be found?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam ba de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from the condition of the body’s contact with its objects, which is beyond being an object of comparison, to be found?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam /🔽sa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su yod dam / sa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sa'i khams dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the feeling that arises from the condition of the mind’s contact with its objects, which is beyond being an object of comparison, to be found?🔽Is the earth element, which is beyond being an object of comparison, to be found?

original: chu'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: chu'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the water element, which is beyond being an object of comparison, to be found?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam /🔽me'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmigs su yod dam / me'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the water element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind, found in the water element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la me'i khams dmigs su yod dam /🔽rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmigs su yod dam /🔽nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la me'i khams dmigs su yod dam / rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmigs su yod dam / nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the fire element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind, found in the fire element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind?🔽Is the wind element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind, found in the wind element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmigs su yod dam /🔽rnam @230b par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmigs su yod dam / rnam @230b par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the space element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind, found in the space element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind?🔽Is the consciousness element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind, found in the consciousness element, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind?

original: ma rig pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is ignorance, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind, found in ignorance, which is beyond being an object of conceptual mind?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is ignorance that is equal to the unequaled observable?

analyzed: 'du byed gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmigs su yod dam /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam /

analyzed: ming dang gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ming dang gzugs dmigs su yod dam /

analyzed: skye mched drug gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmigs su yod dam /

analyzed: rga shi gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa @231b de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su yod dam /
translated: and which is equal to the unequaled, something that can be apprehended?

original: nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is inner emptiness, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and cannot be measured or evaluated,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /

original: phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the emptiness of the external, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: and equal to the unequaled, something that can be observed?

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the emptiness of the external and internal, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: and equal to the unequaled, something that can be observed?

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the emptiness of emptiness, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: and equal to the unequaled, something that can be observed?

original: chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the emptiness of great extent, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: and equal to the unequaled, something that can be observed?

original: don dam pa stong pa @232a *//
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa @232a *//
translated: Is the emptiness of ultimate reality, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,🔽and equal to the unequaled, something that can be observed?

original: nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: It is inconceivable, immeasurable, and incalculable.🔽

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the ultimate emptiness, which is inconceivable, incomparable, immeasurable, and equal to the unequaled, observable?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the emptiness of the conditioned, which is inconceivable, incomparable, immeasurable, and equal to the unequaled, observable?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: Is the emptiness of the unconditioned, which is inconceivable, incomparable, immeasurable, and equal to the unequaled, observable?

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, which is inconceivable, incomparable, immeasurable, and equal to the unequaled, observable?

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: “Is the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of what is not to be discarded in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: “Is the emptiness of nature in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of all phenomena in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: “Is the emptiness of defining characteristics in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /🔽chos thams cad stong @232b pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam / chos thams cad stong @232b pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /
translated: “Is the emptiness of the primordial nature in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of the ultimate in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: “Is the emptiness of the conditioned in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of the unconditioned in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of what is beyond extremes in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of the unlimited in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”🔽“Is the emptiness of nonrepudiation in the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless found?”

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the emptiness of defining attributes, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,🔽something that can be apprehended?

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the emptiness of non-apprehension, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,🔽something that can be apprehended?

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste /🔽mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su yod dam /
translated: Is the emptiness of non-entities, which is inconceivable, incomparable, and immeasurable,🔽something that can be apprehended?
